source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000010_CID<tab>Ah, excellent timing! We've just finished our work on the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>. She's so much improved, I've decided to give her a new name to suit:
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000010_CID<tab>来たな……ついに完成したぜ。
新たに生まれ変わった「エンタープライズ」……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000020_CID<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>! Or simply the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>, if pressed for time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000020_CID<tab>……いや、「エンタープライズ・エクセルシオ」だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000030_CID<tab>Once again, she'll carry Eorzea's protectors into battle!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000030_CID<tab>俺たちの新たな翼で、
お前たちを、決戦の地に送り届けてやるぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000040_WEDGE<tab>All aboard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000040_WEDGE<tab>さあ、乗船するッス！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000050_EDMONT<tab>I can do no more than see you off with prayers for your safety and success.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000050_EDMONT<tab>英雄殿……。
私には、こうやって貴殿を見送ることしかできない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000060_EDMONT<tab>Yet know that wheresoever you may go, my son's spirit goes with you. May the Fury grant you strength!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000060_EDMONT<tab>しかし、我が息子オルシュファンの想いは、
常に貴方とともにある……どうか、ご武運を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Return to us─all of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000070_AYMERIC<tab>帰って来るのだぞ、必ず……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000080_CID<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>...engage!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000080_CID<tab>「エンタープライズ・エクセルシオ」、発進！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100010_CID<tab>This is it! Get ready!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100010_CID<tab>いよいよだ、準備はいいな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100020_ESTINIEN<tab>Eye of mine enemy! Render unto me thy power!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100020_ESTINIEN<tab>「眼」の力を解放する……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100030_ESTINIEN<tab>Ugh... No... You will not claim me! I am the master!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100030_ESTINIEN<tab>グッ……なんという力……。
黙っていろ……貴様の主は、この俺だ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100040_CID<tab>Yaaaaaargh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100040_CID<tab>うおおおおおおッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100050_ALPHINAUD<tab>We're through!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100050_ALPHINAUD<tab>抜けたぞッ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100060_BIGGS<tab>Chief! We've got an imperial battleship on our tail! And it's bleedin' <var 1A 02 /var>massive<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100060_BIGGS<tab>こ、後方に帝国軍アグリウス級飛空戦艦ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100070_CID<tab>Damn it! The bastards were waiting for us to open the door for them!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100070_CID<tab>クソッ！
奴らめ、俺たちがフィールドを突破するのを、
待っていたってわけか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100080_CID<tab>I'm going to try to shake them! Hang on to something!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100080_CID<tab>振り切るぞ、みんな掴まれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100090_WEDGE<tab>Uwaaaaaah! We're all going to die! Tataruuu!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100090_WEDGE<tab>うわあああああ！！
当たる、当たる、当たっちゃうッス！
……タタルさん、助けて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100100_BIGGS<tab>She won't take much more of this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100100_BIGGS<tab>クソッ、このままじゃ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100110_ICEHEART<tab>The time is come to use Hydaelyn's gift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100110_ICEHEART<tab>かつて星の意思から授かった、光のクリスタル……。
……今こそ使う時か。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100120_ICEHEART<tab>Much blood has been spilled in my name. And for what? For a false cause that I created for want of the warmth of companionship.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100120_ICEHEART<tab>これまで、自分の主我のために、多くの犠牲を出してきた。
結局私は、凍えた身体を温めるための、仲間が欲しかったのだ……
そのために、大義を創った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100130_ICEHEART<tab>Saint Shiva...Hraesvelgr... Pray forgive this fool.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100130_ICEHEART<tab>許して、シヴァ。
……そして、フレースヴェルグ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100140_ICEHEART<tab>But even now, I cannot let go of my dream─my dream of a tomorrow in which no child need freeze alone in the snow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100140_ICEHEART<tab>それでも私は、どうしても見てみたい……。
少女が雪原のただ中で、凍えずとも済む時代をッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100150_ICEHEART<tab>Thank you, Hraesvelgr.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100150_ICEHEART<tab>ありがとう フレースヴェルグ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Is that...Ysayle? What does she mean to do!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>あれは イゼル？
何をするつもりだ！！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100170_ICEHEART<tab>O goddess born of mine own hopes and dreams.
For the last time, I beseech you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100170_ICEHEART<tab>聖女シヴァ――
いえ 願いによって造られた 私自身の神よ！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100180_ICEHEART<tab>Fill this vessel with your light! Still the hatred
within our hearts and bless us with eternal grace!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100180_ICEHEART<tab>今こそ我が身に降りて
真の融和のために 最期の静寂を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100190_ICEHEART<tab>Farewell, Warrior of Light. And thank you─for showing me the way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100190_ICEHEART<tab>さらばだ 光の戦士
私を導いてくれて ありがとう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>NOOOOOO!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>イゼル…………！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100210_YSHTOLA<tab>This aether... It was a Crystal of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100210_YSHTOLA<tab>あのエーテル……あれは、光のクリスタル……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100220_YSHTOLA<tab>She, too, was one of Hydaelyn's chosen...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100220_YSHTOLA<tab>彼女もまた、間違いなく、
ハイデリンに導かれた光の戦士だったのね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100230_ESTINIEN<tab>Fare you well, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100230_ESTINIEN<tab>……さらばだ、「氷の巫女」よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200010_REGULA<tab>Our objective lies at the heart of the isle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200010_REGULA<tab>艦内でも説明したとおり、
これより、我々は魔大陸中枢に向かう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200020_REGULA<tab>The Third will remain to guard the ship, while the Second patrols the perimeter and eliminates any threats.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200020_REGULA<tab>第III歩兵中隊は、艦の護衛のため、この場に残れ。
第II歩兵中隊は散開し、アラグの防衛兵器を排除せよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200030_REGULA<tab>The First will come with me to secure the research facility.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200030_REGULA<tab>第I歩兵中隊は、我に続き、
「魔科学研究所」の制圧を目指す。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200040_REGULA<tab>Let no man doubt the import of our mission: the Allagans found a means to capture eikons alive, and their knowledge lies hid upon this isle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200040_REGULA<tab>いいか、パラメキア諜報機関からの報告によると、
この「魔大陸」には、蛮神を生きたまま捕らえる、
アラグの秘術が眠っているという。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200050_REGULA<tab>If we can but acquire it, we would be able to prevent the beings from returning to plague us, thus ending the cycle of rebirth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200050_REGULA<tab>星を蝕む病魔は、蛮族どもの願いで何度でも蘇る。
だが、封じてしまえば、それも叶わぬこととなるだろう。
その意義の大きさを肝に銘じておけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200060_REGULA<tab>I need not remind you that success will raise our legion high in the Emperor's regard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200060_REGULA<tab>これは本国に帰還された皇帝陛下に、
我ら第VI軍団の実力を示す、またとない好機でもある！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200070_REGULA<tab>Yet, by the same token, His Radiance does not tolerate failure. That is all. All troops, prepare for deployment!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200070_REGULA<tab>だが、皇帝陛下は、敗北をお許しにならぬ御方……
己が手で、必ずや陛下の重畳を賜るのだッ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200080_YSHTOLA<tab>So that is their purpose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200080_YSHTOLA<tab>蛮神を封じる技術……。
それが、帝国軍の狙いなのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200090_ALPHINAUD<tab>To think that the knowledge used to bind no less a being than Bahamut sleeps here...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200090_ALPHINAUD<tab>古の蛮神「バハムート」を封じた技術が、
ここに残されているということか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200100_YSHTOLA<tab>Imprisoning a primal in such a manner would represent an effective means to halt the cycle of summoning─were it not for the grave and obvious risks.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200100_YSHTOLA<tab>蛮神を封印できれば、確かに再召喚は防げるわ。
蛮神問題に対する、ひとつの解法ともいえなくもない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. We need but refer to past experience─that of Bahamut's calamitous return─to see why this is not the solution we seek.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200110_ALPHINAUD<tab>いいや、答えはすでに出ているよ、ヤ・シュトラ。
バハムートは蘇り、絶望が世を包み、世界は崩壊しかけたんだ。
「第七霊災」を忘れたわけではないだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200120_YSHTOLA<tab>Held in duress, a primal will continue to nurse its hatred for mankind. And when it inevitably breaks free, its rage will be beyond quelling.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200120_YSHTOLA<tab>封じられた蛮神は、負の感情を膨らませ続け、
やがて、大いなる災いを引き起こすということね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200130_ESTINIEN<tab>Whatever folly the Garleans mean to commit, they can wait. We must remain focused on our task.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200130_ESTINIEN<tab>目下の問題は、教皇の方だ。
今の状況で帝国と戦ったとして、
それを最も喜ぶのは、奴らだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes, of course. It would not be polite to keep the archbishop waiting.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200140_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうだな、先を急ごう。
まずは教皇を止める……帝国はその次だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300010_REGULA<tab>That would explain my men's silence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300010_REGULA<tab>通信が途絶えた部隊があると思って来てみれば、
貴様らだったとはな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300020_REGULA<tab>We meet again. And this time, we will not be interrupted.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300020_REGULA<tab>この前は邪魔が入ったが、
ひとつお手合わせを願おうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300030_REGULA<tab>Come! Show me your power, champions of Eorzea!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300030_REGULA<tab>エオルゼアの英雄の実力……
見極めさせてもらうぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400010_REGULA<tab>I had heard the tales of your strength, Warrior of Light. And now that I have experienced it firsthand, van Baelsar's defeat seems less inexplicable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400010_REGULA<tab>ふむ……。
さすがは、英雄と呼ばれるだけのことはある……か。
なかなかの戦いぶりだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400020_REGULA<tab>You are a formidable foe, and I have thoroughly enjoyed our time together. Alas, all good things must come to an end. Allagan secrets await, and there is no profit to be had in remaining here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400020_REGULA<tab>……さて、こちらの準備が整ったようなのでね。
戯れの時間は終いにしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400030_REGULA<tab>Keep them occupied!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400030_REGULA<tab>お前たち、適当に相手をして時間を稼いでおけ！
例の秘術さえ手に入れれば、
こんなところに用はないのだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400040_ESTINIEN<tab>Coward...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400040_ESTINIEN<tab>時間稼ぎか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem we have no choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>こうなったら、やるしかないようね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400060_ALPHINAUD<tab>You must continue on. We will hold them here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400060_ALPHINAUD<tab>君は、先に進むんだ。
ここは、私たちで持ちこたえる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400070_ESTINIEN<tab>Take the Eye. It should still hold enough energy to be of use to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400070_ESTINIEN<tab>光の戦士よ、これをお前に預けておく。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400080_ESTINIEN<tab>I shall join you as soon as I am able.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400080_ESTINIEN<tab>「エーテルラム」の起動で、多少消耗はしているが、
お守り代わりにでもしていろ。
……俺もすぐに向かう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400090_YSHTOLA<tab>Enough talk! Make haste and stop the archbishop!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400090_YSHTOLA<tab>さあ、おしゃべりもここまでのようよ。
早く行って！　行って、教皇を止めなさい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500010_TIAMAT<tab>(-???-)Who cometh to this forsaken place and disturbeth my solitude?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500010_TIAMAT<tab>(-？？？？-)数千年の長きに渡り、閉ざされてきたこの地に、
再び人が訪れようとは……何者だ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tiamat, my child.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>久しいな……。
我が子、ティアマットよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500030_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)...Father? Can it truly be you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500030_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)おぉぉぉ……なんということだ、その御姿は……？
しかし、確かに貴方はミドガルズオルム、我が父よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>None other. My form is such that I may journey with Hydaelyn's chosen─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>故あって仮初めの幻体に心を移し、
この者……ハイデリンの使徒と、ともに旅をしておる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>A mortal who desireth to end the war between man and dragon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>竜とヒトとの争いの禍根を断つため、
自ら苦難の道を歩むというのでな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500060_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Millennia have passed since I was brought low by the men of Allag. To think that war rageth still between our kinds...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500060_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)……我がアラグとの戦いに敗れてより幾星霜。
まさか、エオルゼアの地でもまた、
竜と人との争いが起こっていたとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500070_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Hearken to my tale, child of man. I am Tiamat, of Midgardsormr's first brood.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500070_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)聞け、人の子よ……。
我が名はティアマット、黄昏に消えゆく竜……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500080_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)In a time before time, my father did come to this star, bearing seven eggs.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500080_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)始原の時、生まれたばかりのこの星に、
我が父、ミドガルズオルムが降り立った。
……七の卵を携えてな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500090_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>From these eggs did my children hatch. And once they were full-grown, they took wing and spread across all the lands of Hydaelyn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500090_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>そして、成長した我が子ら……
後に、「七大天竜」と呼ばれる者たちは、
ハイデリン各地の大陸へと飛び立ったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500100_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Together with my brood-brother Bahamut, I journeyed south to Meracydia. And together, we brought forth innumerable children into the world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500100_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)我と愛しき同胞であったバハムートは、
南方大陸メラシディアに渡り、多くの子を成した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500110_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)We abided in peace, and all was well...until the men of Allag came, some five thousand years since. They slaughtered my children in droves, and took from me my beloved Bahamut.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500110_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)だが、五千年の昔……
人の軍勢、すなわちアラグの民が南方を侵略。
我らが子を焼き、遂にはバハムートをも殺したのだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500120_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)'Twas then, when I had fallen into the depths of despair, that black-robed men came unto me. The Ascians.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500120_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)我を深い悲しみと絶望が包んだその時であった……。
漆黒の衣をまとった者、アシエンが現れたのは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500130_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)They offered to resurrect Bahamut through their dark arts, and I, in my grief, accepted─a decision which I shall regret unto my dying breath.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500130_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)我は奴らと密約し、バハムートの復活を願った……
だが、呼び降ろされたそれは、紛い物だったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500140_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)For what they brought back was a mockery of my beloved. Worse, the Ascians gifted his murderers the means to entrap him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500140_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)アシエンどもはアラグの民にも知恵を授け、
バハムートは、永劫の檻に捕えられた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500150_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Know this, child of man: the beings thy kind call gods are but specters of thy mind's creation, given form at great cost to Hydaelyn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500150_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)よいか、人の子よ。
神とは想像力の産物……
願いの力が、星の命を用いて作り出す虚像。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500160_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Many such beings yet slumber across the land, brought to heel by the selfsame empire that bound me. They must not be released into the world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500160_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)そして、この地にはアラグに抗わんとして、
降ろされた多数の神が封じられている。
……これを解き放ってはならぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500170_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)If thou wouldst end the conflict, vanquish thee the Ascians, and deliver the weak of will from the bonds of their dark influence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500170_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)争いの禍根を絶つならば、神にすがる弱き者と、
その眼を曇らせるアシエンどもを倒すのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>It hath been five thousand years, my child. Wilt thou not forgive thyself?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>ティアマットよ。
五千年の時を数えてなお、自らを許せぬのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500190_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)The release of death is denied me here, yet I desire not freedom. Nay, Father. I shall live with my regret until the world itself hath ceased to be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500190_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)ここは、死すら叶わぬ時の牢獄……。
しかし、我はここを出ることを望まぬ。
時の果てる、その日まで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500200_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Such is my just punishment for consorting with Darkness─for calling forth a loathsome and lamentable creature which blackeneth my beloved's memory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500200_TIAMAT<tab>(-ティアマット-)一時の感情に呑まれ、神降ろしに手を染め……
バハムートの魂をねじ曲げ、穢してしまった己への罰……。
……そう、これは贖罪なのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600010_HYDAELYN<tab>Warrior of Light. Beloved <var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600010_HYDAELYN<tab>クリスタルに導かれし光の戦士よ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600020_HYDAELYN<tab>The Light abideth within thy heart again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600020_HYDAELYN<tab>あなたの心に 再び光の宿りを感じます

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600030_HYDAELYN<tab>Full valiantly didst thou overcome thy many trials.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600030_HYDAELYN<tab>よくぞ 幻龍の試練に耐えました

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600040_HYDAELYN<tab>But glory not in thy success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600040_HYDAELYN<tab>しかし 安心してはなりません

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600050_HYDAELYN<tab>For the servants of Darkness are ever close at hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600050_HYDAELYN<tab>深淵に潜む者たちが すぐそこまで迫っています

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600060_HYDAELYN<tab>Receive of me my blessing once more,
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600060_HYDAELYN<tab>今一度 あなたに光の加護を

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600070_HYDAELYN<tab>And go forth, to shine thy Light on all creation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600070_HYDAELYN<tab>そして どうか世界を光あるものに――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thou hast broken down the wall I built around thee, and partaken of thy mistress's blessing once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>我が「爪」のすべてを打ち砕き、
再び、光の加護を取り戻したか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700011_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Strong art thou, mortal─stronger than any other of thy kind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700011_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>生まれ落ちてより、今日この日に至るまで、
我は、お主ほど、心強き者を知らぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Having looked upon thy deeds, I am convinced. Thou art worthy to bear Her Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>ハイデリンの使徒よ……
今のお主であれば、我が背に乗るに相応しい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>The covenant bound me to thee, but 'twould seem our fates were mingled from the first. Though I will not fight thy battles, I will yet lend thee my wings.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>生まれし日に、母なるハイデリンと誓った盟約に従い……
今こそ我が翼を、お主に授けようぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Come, mortal─we go to cast out the Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>ゆくぞ、闇の使徒どもを討つために！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800010_LAHABREA<tab>The champion of Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800010_LAHABREA<tab>来たか 光の使徒よ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800020_IGEYOHRM<tab>Tell me: why do you despise the primals so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800020_IGEYOHRM<tab>何故 お前はそうも神を憎む？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800030_IGEYOHRM<tab>They are the embodiment of mortal will─of mortal desire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800030_IGEYOHRM<tab>神とは人の意思によりて降りしもの

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800040_IGEYOHRM<tab>Plainly, you <var 1A 02 /var>desire<var 1A 01 /var> a foe to despise. And 'tis well
that you do, for it is from the vortex of ceaseless conflict
that Lord Zodiark shall be reborn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800040_IGEYOHRM<tab>その神と神との争いがもたらす混沌こそが
新たに生まれいずるゾディアーク様の産湯となるのだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800050_LAHABREA<tab>Through the Joining, the world shall become whole again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800050_LAHABREA<tab>次元圧壊を経て
世界は 再びひとつに戻る

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800060_LAHABREA<tab>Then all shall be as once it was─as it should ever have remained.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800060_LAHABREA<tab>そして 世界をあるべき姿に再創造されるのだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800070_IGEYOHRM<tab>For the glory of Lord Zodiark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800070_IGEYOHRM<tab>すべては ゾディアーク様のために

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800080_LAHABREA<tab>Your meddling ends here and now, Warrior of Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800080_LAHABREA<tab>邪魔はさせんぞ 光の使徒よ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900010_LAHABREA<tab>Such strength! It defies all reason...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900010_LAHABREA<tab>よもや これほどの力を――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900020_IGEYOHRM<tab>No! I will not be bested by the likes of them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900020_IGEYOHRM<tab>認めん 断じて認めはせんぞ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900030_IGEYOHRM<tab>Lahabrea! It is time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900030_IGEYOHRM<tab>ラハブレア！ いまこそひとつに！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900040_LAHABREA<tab>Very well. Let us show these mortals the true power of the Echo...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900040_LAHABREA<tab>仕方あるまい
「超える力」の真なる使い方を見せてやろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900050_LAHABREA<tab>The power to break down the barriers of existence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900050_LAHABREA<tab>魂の境界さえ 超えるほどの力をな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900060_IGEYOHRM<tab>I am become you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900060_IGEYOHRM<tab>我は 汝となりて――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900070_LAHABREA<tab>...And we are become one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900070_LAHABREA<tab>――汝は 我となる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900080_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Come, mortals! Render up your souls, that Lord Zodiark might be reborn!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900080_ASCIANPRIME<tab>贄となるがいい!
ゾディアーク様の新生のために！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00010_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Aaargh!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00010_ASCIANPRIME<tab>ぐおぉぉ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00020_ASCIANPRIME<tab>What walls are these? Arrrgh! Damn you, Hydaelyn!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00020_ASCIANPRIME<tab>魂に境界が造られているッ！？
ええい 忌まわしきハイデリンめ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00030_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>That <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> might regain the blessing of Light I had foreseen...<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00030_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>チィ……！
光の加護を、完全に取り戻していたとは！<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00040_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is grown so strong in it as to deny us our power.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00040_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>我らの「超える力」を打ち破るほどに
加護が強くなっているだと……？
……このままでは。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00050_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Let us withdraw, Lahabrea. That power remains to us, at least.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00050_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>退くぞラハブレア……。
奴は今、我らの魂を砕く魔器を持たぬ！<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00060_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Impossible!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00060_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>馬鹿なッ！<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00070_IGEYOHRM<tab>Aaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00070_IGEYOHRM<tab>グ、グアアァァァァァァァァ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00080_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>So you harnessed the Eye's power... A pity you spent it all. What will you do now, hero?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00080_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>「竜の眼」の力を引き出したか……。
しかし、もはや小細工はあるまい？<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00090_THORDAN<tab>So, not even the vaunted Warrior of Light can unmake an Ascian without relying upon mortal contrivances.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00090_THORDAN<tab>やはり、ハイデリンの加護を受けし「光の戦士」といえど、
魂封じる檻なくして、アシエンを斬ることは叶わぬか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00100_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00100_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>トールダンだと！？<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00110_THORDAN<tab>In the distant past, King Thordan and his knights twelve fought and defeated Nidhogg.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00110_THORDAN<tab>かつてトールダン王と十二騎士たちは、
大きな犠牲を払いながらも、ニーズヘッグを退けた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00120_THORDAN<tab>Though the victory cost them dear, they were rewarded with a great prize: the dread wyrm's eyes, both of which have since been held in the Holy See's safekeeping.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00120_THORDAN<tab>そして、ふたつの「竜の眼」を手に入れ、
以降、イシュガルド教皇庁は、これを厳重に管理してきた。
「蒼の竜騎士」の力の源としてな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00130_THORDAN<tab>The Eye you possess was Nidhogg's left, and long has it served as the source of the Azure Dragoon's might. As for its twin...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00130_THORDAN<tab>光の使徒よ。
お主の手にあるそれが、ニーズヘッグの左眼……
では、右眼はどこにあるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00140_THORDAN<tab>It has lain here, joined to the person of Haldrath, the first Azure Dragoon. For though he learned to harness its power, he was ultimately consumed by it. Even in death, his body decays not─a pitiful end for a fabled hero.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00140_THORDAN<tab>初代「蒼の竜騎士」……征竜将「ハルドラス」……。
眼から力を引き出しながらも、その力に呑まれ、
朽ちぬ死体と化した哀れな男よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00150_THORDAN<tab>My Ascian friend. Long have you and your kind sown the seeds of chaos by teaching mortals the secrets of summoning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00150_THORDAN<tab>闇の使徒、アシエンよ……。
貴様らは、人々に神降ろしの手法を教え、
争いを煽り、混沌を生み出す。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00160_THORDAN<tab>But if you assumed that we would meekly serve as your pawns, then you are gravely mistaken.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00160_THORDAN<tab>だが、すべてが自分たちの思惑どおりに進むなどと、
思わぬことだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00170_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You would raise a hand against us!?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00170_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>貴様ッ……！<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00180_THORDAN<tab>By taking unto my flesh the soul of the legendary King Thordan, I am become a god─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00180_THORDAN<tab>伝説の騎士王を我が身に呼び降ろし、我は神となる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00190_THORDAN<tab>A god who knows not cessation, whose being is sustained by a millennium of fervent prayer and the Eye's nigh-bottomless reservoir of aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00190_THORDAN<tab>「千年戦争」により蓄積された民の祈りと、
「眼」がもたらす莫大なエーテルとが創り出す、
消え去ることのない永遠の神……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00200_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What!?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00200_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>永遠の神……だと……！？<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00210_THORDAN<tab>Your contempt for man has proven your undoing, Ascian. For my first act as god-king, I do hereby sentence you to die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00210_THORDAN<tab>人を侮りすぎよな、アシエン・ラハブレア……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00220_LAHABREA<tab>Aaaaaargggh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00220_LAHABREA<tab>ウガァァァァァァァァァァァ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00230_THORDAN<tab>Gods feed upon aether. It matters not what form that aether takes. Ascian souls are no exception. With this power, I shall put an end to a thousand years of conflict.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00230_THORDAN<tab>神はエーテルを喰らう。
それが、アシエンの魂の欠片であったとしても、な。
……これこそが千年の禍根を断つ力。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00240_THORDAN<tab>Be they sown by Ascian, dragon, or primal, wheresoever the seeds of chaos threaten to quicken, I shall excise them with my divine blade and bring order to the world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00240_THORDAN<tab>アシエン、ドラゴン、蛮神……
争いを生み出すすべてを、我が聖剣によって断ち斬り、
調和の世をもたらさん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00250_THORDAN<tab>I am become that which you abhor, Warrior of Light. If you would take issue with my godhood, I shall answer you with my blade.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00250_THORDAN<tab>来い、光の使徒よ。
神を否定するというのなら、存分に相手になろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00010_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Brothers! The time is come to call upon the true power of the Heavens' Ward!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00010_ZEPHIRIN<tab>今こそ 我ら蒼天騎士の真の力を見せるときぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00020_THORDAN<tab>Fight me if you will, Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00020_THORDAN<tab>かかってくるがいい 光の使徒よ

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00030_THORDAN<tab>I care not. All who stand against me will be destroyed─
be they servants of the Darkness or the Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00030_THORDAN<tab>永遠の神となった私が
闇の者もろとも 光の使徒をも斬り伏せてくれる

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00040_THORDAN<tab>By my blessing shall all men be sanctified, and an endless era
of peace begin. Vice and conflict shall cease to be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00040_THORDAN<tab>そして すべての人に祝福をあたえ
清らかなる聖徒に造り替え 恒久の平和を授けよう

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00050_THORDAN<tab>You reject my divinity, yet what have you to offer
my people in its stead? Bitter truth? Virtuous suffering?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00050_THORDAN<tab>神を肯定し その力を宿した我が聖剣と
神を否定し その力を捨てた貴様の刃

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00060_THORDAN<tab>No matter. If you believe your cause just,
I call upon you to defend it with your life!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00060_THORDAN<tab>この混沌の時代に
世がどちらを求めているか 確かめようではないか！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00010_THORDAN<tab>How...how can this be? A millennium of prayer
and the Eye's power combined─and still you stand?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00010_THORDAN<tab>馬鹿な―― 千年 千年だぞ――
永き祈りの声と竜の眼でさえ 及ばぬというのか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00020_THORDAN<tab>Who─<var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00020_THORDAN<tab>貴様は いったい何者なのだ――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00030_ESTINIEN<tab>...It is over, then? I had hoped that mine would be the hand to end it...but knowing you, there was little chance of that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00030_ESTINIEN<tab>終わってしまったか……
最後は俺の手でと思ったのだがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00040_ESTINIEN<tab>'Twould seem the Eye has served you well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00040_ESTINIEN<tab>こいつを返してもらいに来た。
なんとか、役に立ったようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00050_ESTINIEN<tab>Its twin... At long last...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00050_ESTINIEN<tab>これが、隠されていた、もうひとつの「眼」か。
長かった……ふたつの「眼」が、ようやく……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00060_ESTINIEN<tab>All that remains is to take them beyond the reach of man and dragon both. With this task accomplished, my toils shall finally be at an end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00060_ESTINIEN<tab>あとは、こいつを雲海深くに投げ入れれば、
俺の使命もそれで……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00070_NIDHOGG<tab>Thou hadst done well to resist mine influence, bathed in my power and blood as thou wert.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00070_NIDHOGG<tab>長らく、我が眼の力に触れ、
さらには全身に我が血を浴びながら、よく耐えてきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00080_NIDHOGG<tab>Alas, in thine anticipation of comfort, thou hast lowered thy guard!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00080_NIDHOGG<tab>……だが、ついに貴様は願ったな、蒼の竜騎士よ！
すべての荷を降ろしたいと！　安らぎが欲しいと！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00090_NIDHOGG<tab>The keening of my fallen kindred... Their smoldering desire for vengeance...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00090_NIDHOGG<tab>心の奥底に燻り続けた復讐の心……
「竜詩戦争」の影で散っていった者たちの慟哭……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00100_NIDHOGG<tab>Mine eyes have partaken of a thousand years of pain─a pain which I shall bestow upon thee.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00100_NIDHOGG<tab>我の「眼」は、そのすべてを視、すべてを写してきた！
今こそ、すべて貴様にくれてやろう……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00110_NIDHOGG<tab>Drink deep of my rage, mortal...AND BECOME ME!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00110_NIDHOGG<tab>……そして、我となれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00120_ESTINIEN<tab>Grrraaarrrgh!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00120_ESTINIEN<tab>グオオオオォォォォ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nidhogg, my child... What hath thy fury made of thee...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>未だすべてを恨むか、我が息子ニーズヘッグよ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00140_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Let us away, servant of Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00140_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>ゆくぞ、ハイデリンの使徒よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00010_WEDGE<tab>Chief! Over there!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00010_WEDGE<tab>親方、あそこッス！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00020_BIGGS<tab>Oi!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00020_BIGGS<tab>おーい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00030_CID<tab>Haha! Godsdammit, do you always have to cut it so bloody close!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00030_CID<tab>ヘヘッ……。
毎度のことながら、ヒヤヒヤさせやがるぜ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00040_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has done it again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00040_YSHTOLA<tab>倒したのね……教皇を……
いえ、蛮神「ナイツ・オブ・ラウンド」を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was there ever any doubt?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>あぁ、信じていたさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us return to Ishgard. Our friends will be eager to learn the battle's outcome...and welcome back their champion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>帰ろう、イシュガルドへ……
皆が、英雄の凱旋を待っている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00070_YSHTOLA<tab>Where is Estinien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00070_YSHTOLA<tab>……エスティニアンがいない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00010_AYMERIC<tab>I daresay you are the first soul in Ishgardian history to arrive in our city upon dragonback. This scene shall be remembered for a thousand years to come.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00010_AYMERIC<tab>イシュガルド建国史上において、
竜の背に乗って皇都に凱旋した者は、君が初めてだろうな。
……これもまた千年の後、伝説として語り継がれるのだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>As we had feared, the archbishop summoned the soul of King Thordan unto himself and thence became a primal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>蛮神「ナイツ・オブ・ラウンド」と化した、
教皇トールダン7世は討たれた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00030_YSHTOLA<tab>But he and his knights are no more, thanks to the Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00030_YSHTOLA<tab>光の戦士の手によって……ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Your struggles are not yet over, mortals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>……すべてが終わった訳ではないぞ、ヒトの子よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00050_AYMERIC<tab>Whom do I have the pleasure...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00050_AYMERIC<tab>貴方は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I am Midgardsormr. I have journeyed with Hydaelyn's champion and observed <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> deeds in the conflict between man and dragon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>我が名は、幻龍「ミドガルズオルム」……。
ハイデリンの使徒とともに旅し、
竜とヒトとの争いの行く末を見守ってきた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tell me, children of Thordan. Do you desire peace?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>イシュガルドの民、トールダンの子らに問う。
お主たちは、再び、竜との調和を望むか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00080_AYMERIC<tab>My people have committed unspeakable atrocities against dragonkind─even against our own. Would that we could undo these wrongs...but we cannot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00080_AYMERIC<tab>人の戦いを導いてきた虚構は崩れ去りました。
そして、竜を率いてきたニーズヘッグもまた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00090_AYMERIC<tab>Be that as it may, the future yet presents a chance to begin anew. Our nation has broken free of the shackles of a false faith, and Nidhogg shall lead his kindred against us no more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00090_AYMERIC<tab>人は竜に対し、そして同じ人に対して、
幾たびも同じ過ちを繰り返してきました。
むろん、それを水に流してほしいとは申しません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00100_AYMERIC<tab>I doubt not that it will require much effort and perseverance, but 'tis my belief that, in time, Ishgard will again become a place where man and dragon may abide together in harmony.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00100_AYMERIC<tab>それでも私は、この先のイシュガルドが、
人と竜が手を携える土地となれることを信じています。
……それでは、足りぬでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00110_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I shall remember thy words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00110_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>……その言葉、しかと我が胸に刻んだぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00120_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Yet be warned: Nidhogg's soul liveth on.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00120_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>だが、心せよ……。
我が子、ニーズヘッグの魂は死しておらぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>His unbridled rage hath claimed for its vessel the one thou callest the Azure Dragoon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>ニーズヘッグの怨念に取り憑かれ、
蒼の竜騎士は堕ち、邪竜の影と化した……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00140_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00140_AYMERIC<tab>まさか……エスティニアンが！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00150_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Doubt not but that Nidhogg will call out to his brood ere long, nor that they shall answer him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00150_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>ニーズヘッグの眷属たちもまた、
我が子が発した復讐の咆哮に応えるであろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00160_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Steel yourselves, for the true test is yet to come.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00160_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>戦火のすべてが消えたわけではない。
竜とヒト、その本当の試練はこれからなのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00170_AYMERIC<tab>Come what may, we will never cease to believe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00170_AYMERIC<tab>それでも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00180_AYMERIC<tab>Upon the souls of they who have sacrificed themselves to pave the way for peace, we will never abandon our cause.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00180_AYMERIC<tab>未来を信じて散っていった者たち……
そして、我が友らの魂に誓って、
私も、人も、諦めはしません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>A thousand-year war cannot be ended in a day. It may take generations. What thou dost begin, thy children must continue.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>千年の戦は、一朝一夕に終わるものではなかろう。
だからこそ、次の世代に希望を伝えよ、ヒトの子らよ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00200_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Entrust unto them thy hopes and dreams, that peace may reign again...and forevermore.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00200_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>その先にこそ……
光に満ちた、調和の時代が待っているのだから。
